attributes.action: To give key worker and front line worker a 5 % increase to their pay .
attributes.additional_details: I'm doing this because we really do take the nhs for granted but not just the nhs , shop workers , care workers ,mail people who deliver our mail on a daily basic and many more people who risk their lives on the daily all our keyworkers .I'm trying to do this to not only say thankyou but to show how much you mean to us . During this pandemic . Thankyou
attributes.background:
I want you to give keyworkers and frontline workers a 5 % pay rise . 
Because they are risking their lives every day for minimum wage or peanuts despite  risking their own lives and the lives of their families  .

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for setting the wages of people outside of the public sector.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign: 

Suspend PAYE Tax for all frontline Key workers for 6 months: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556818

Require all key and essential workers be paid at least the Real Living Wage: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559885
